tool_description: Extract metadata from any URL effortlessly. Perfect for generating website previews.
name: Url to Metadata
title: Url to Metadata

api_list.name: Medatada
api_list.description: The 'metadata' endpoint allows users to retrieve comprehensive metadata from a specified URL by simply providing it as a query parameter. This endpoint enables quick and easy extraction of essential website information, including title, description, images, favicon, language, author, canonical URL, and more. Streamline your development process and enhance your applications by integrating this powerful endpoint to effortlessly generate website previews and enrich your content with accurate and up-to-date metadata.
